channel.title: nyAya-shAstra-vidyAdharI न्याय-शास्त्रम्
channel.description:
A podcast created using https://github.com/vedavaapi/scala-akka-http-server from the archive item: https://archive.org/details/Nyaya-Shastram---Vidyadharii-2016, with description: Nyaya Shastram is the subject known in English as logic. It is highly stimulating as well as beneficial for Samskrita Students who have achieved good proficiency in the language. Traditionally considered extremely challenging--sometimes even prohibitively so-- it has now, with the publication in Oct 2014 of Vidyadharii, become accessible and enjoyable for general students of Samskrta, for the first time.

Here are presented the recordings of the Nyaya-Shastram---Vidyadharii-2016 varga. All are welcome to download, listen, and enjoy.

Further information about our vargas is available on our website.

For any questions or comments, feel free to contact Swarup at dinbandhu@sprynet.com.
